definition.name: NXapm_input_reconstruction
definition.doc: Metadata of a dataset (tomographic reconstruction) in atom probe microscopy.

field.name: filename
field.doc: Name of the (NeXus)/HDF5 file which stores reconstructed ion position and mass-to-charge-state ratios. Such an HDF5 file can store multiple reconstructions. Using an identifier (ID) is the mechanism which paraprobe uses to distinguish which specific reconstruction will be processed. With this design it is possible that the same HDF5 file stores multiple versions of a reconstruction of e.g. the same or different measured datasets, respectively.

attribute.name: version
attribute.doc: Version identifier of the file (representing an at least SHA256) hash which documents the binary state of the file to add an additional layer of reproducibility for tracking provenance.

field.name: dataset_name_reconstruction
field.doc: Name of the dataset inside the HDF5 file which refers to the specific reconstructed ion positions to use for this analysis.

field.name: dataset_name_mass_to_charge
field.doc: Name of the dataset inside the HDF5 file which refers to the specific mass-to-charge-state ratios to use for this analysis.
